body:
Fixes #26210 

As reported in the error, attempts to stage or install the package fail with `Connection reset by peer` errors.  This has been happening *at least* today for builds on different efforts (including CI/CD jobs).

This PR switches from the `http://www.qhull.org` URL for downloads to the GitHub repository, which appears to have all of the necessary versions PLUS an update.

I am now able to successfully install the package for all of the explicitly listed versions.
title: qhull: use secure github URLS instead of www.qhull.org downloads
